Stackotaire

A simple recreation of the card game Solitaire where the goal is to place cards in sequence and in the same suit. Played inside an console with commands and you can try it out now on my Github.

Piano Simulator

A virtual piano that you can play using your keyboard or mouse all while recording or playback what you've played already and when your done you can save what you've recorded.
